title: A Dose of reality
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Veterans - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities
abstract: 'An impossible curiosity and not wanting to know.'
description: Andrew Dobbyn feels he has lived a privileged life. A baby boomer with a war veteran father, Dobbyn's family did what they could to help the wives and children of those who didn't return from the war. Despite this, Dobbyn felt he could be doing more and highlights two events in his life that showed him just how lucky he is.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002330; Legacy : a promise for the future : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2010
